img_above_text:
![Wukong Lanxi 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/66/Wukong_Lanxi_1.jpg)
You'll awaken in this new realm hiding inside an offering chest for a mysterious "Lady", being carried to The Webbed Hollow by two Yaoguai. Eventually, your fiend Zhu Bajie will grow tired of hiding, but before you can bust out, a mysterious woman will eliminate the two Wushan Lesser Guai.
img_below_text:
Once you're able to take stock of your new surroundings, you'll find yourself on the outskirts of a village under cover of night. Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest.
![Wukong Lanxi 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e2/Wukong_Lanxi_3.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Lanxi 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/66/Wukong_Lanxi_1.jpg)
You'll awaken in this new realm hiding inside an offering chest for a mysterious "Lady", being carried to The Webbed Hollow by two Yaoguai. Eventually, your fiend Zhu Bajie will grow tired of hiding, but before you can bust out, a mysterious woman will eliminate the two Wushan Lesser Guai."
        - Following Text: "Once you're able to take stock of your new surroundings, you'll find yourself on the outskirts of a village under cover of night. Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest.
![Wukong Lanxi 3.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e2/Wukong_Lanxi_3.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the protagonist of *Black Myth: Wukong* exploring a dimly lit, forested area near a small shack under cover of night. A green glowing object, marked with a red circle, is visible inside the shack, suggesting it is a collectible or interactable item (likely the green Wisp mentioned in the following text). The scene aligns with the narrative of the player taking stock of their surroundings after escaping captivity and preparing to explore the village outskirts.
